title: Lenient or Not?
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Emma-senpaaai! There’s an emergency~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What’s wrong, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is in danger and needs to hide!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Okay...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>If Shizuko and Shioko come, tell them that Kasumin has run far away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>S-Sure. But why are you running?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin’s final exam scores......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I see...... Shizuku-chaaan! Shioriko-chaaan! Kasumi-chan is over here~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Whaaaaaat!? W-Why~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s not good to run away from such things. Have a good day, Kasumi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Auuuugghhhhh~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
